verbose_text: Reduction in the fasting and postprandial blood sugar levels with leaves of insulin plant in dexamethasone induced hyperglycemia was comparable with that obtained with Glibenclamide 500 mug/kg at 250 mg/kg and 500 mg/kg of powdered leaves of the insulin plant (Costus igeus) (P <.01) (Mann-Whitney U test) [XREF_FIG].
